snippet: The Detroit Tigers’ Victor Martinez needs surgery after injuring his left knee during his off-season workout program for the second time in four years.
abstract: Detroit Tigers designated hitter Victor Martinez requires knee surgery for second time in four years; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Detroit Tigers’ Victor Martinez needs surgery after injuring his left knee during his off-season workout program for the second time in four years.

headline.main: Knee Surgery for Tigers’ Victor Martinez
